taskbody.context: In this section of the lab you will start the Eucalyptus services on the front-end and Node Controller hosts.

step.cmd: On the front-end host, perform a first-time initialization of the Cloud Controller database.Â This command will take a few minutes to complete.
On the front-end host, start the front-end services (Cloud Controller, Walrus, Cluster Controller, Storage Controller).

info.codeblock: # service eucalyptus-cloud start # service eucalyptus-cc start

step.cmd: On the front-end host, verify that the front-end services are running.

info.codeblock: # service eucalyptus-cloud status # service eucalyptus-cc status

step.cmd: On the Node Controller host, start the Node Controller service.
On the Node Controller host, verify that the Node Controller service is running.
